pages.text: A Moon Charm is gives to a $(l:observations/lycanthropy)Werewolf$(/l) that has chosen to pursue greater power in their affliction. When the creature affected by the curse holds the charm in its inventory, any transformation is prevented, and the werewolf remains in their current form. Simply gifting 3 $(item)Gold Ingots$() to a $(l:constructs/statues/wolf_altar)Wolf Altar$(/l) results in the gifting of another Moon Charm.

pages.title: Forcing Transformations
pages.text: A Moon charm can also be used to force transformations. A strong enough werewolf can use or sneak-use the charm for a few seconds to transform into $(l:observations/lycanthropy#wolf_form)Wolf$(/l) or $(l:observations/lycanthropy#wolfman_form)Wolfman$(/l) forms, respectively. Repeating the same operation will transform back the werewolf to its human form.$(p)Forced transformations are inhibited when the werewolf is under the effects of a $(item)Wolfsbane$() potion.
